name: Classic Macaroni Salad - easy mayo based dressing
description: Easy macaroni salad that is an American classic and perfect for a picnic, bbq or church potluck. Simple instructions for the best macaroni salad without tuna.
ingredients: 3 cups dry macaroni / elbow noodles, uncooked
2 mini cucumbers or 1/2 English cucumber, diced
instructions: Cook noodles according to instructions on package. Drain and cool. In a large bowl mix together the cooked noodles, tomato, pepper, cucumber, celery and scallions. In a separate bowl mix together the rest of the ingredients to make the dressing. Pour the dressing on the macaroni salad and mix until evenly coated.
